title: Work done to create triangle of charge

content.question: Three small spheres are brought together from large distances away and positioned in the equilateral triangle shown above. Which of the following expressions is correct for the work done by an external force in bringing the spheres together?

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative fraction 16 times k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the negative fraction 4 k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction 4 times k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction 9 k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the positive fraction 16 k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>16</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative fraction 4 k q squared over s" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
